short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parse and extracts urls and links from email bodies in your Gmail inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail Links Extractor extension enables the efficient extraction of URLs from email addresses, allowing you to collect information for various purposes, such as marketing, networking, or personal organization.

With a simple click, users can extract all URLs from email bodies, making it easy to compile lists without the hassle of manual copying. The extension features a clear and intuitive interface, providing options to save extracted link in a text file for easy access. 

The free version of the extension allows you to view all the links extracted from Gmail. In order to save these links you need to request the unlock code (Premium version). The saved file will be in txt format and will contain all the links.

Additionally, the extension supports automated extraction, enabling users to navigate through multiple pages of emails while continuously gathering data. The built-in navigation buttons allow for easy transitions between pages, enhancing usability. The extracted links are displayed in real-time, with the total count updated dynamically.

Whether youâ€™re a marketer looking to build a list of URLs, a professional managing contacts, or simply someone wanting to keep their email organized, the Gmail Links Extractor provides a practical solution to optimize your email workflow.
